text: Paulo o ne a tswela kwa ntle mme a mo tsaya ka diatla a re, “Se tshwenyegeng, o siame fela!” Mme ka boammaaruri o ne a siame! Mme ga nna boitumelo jwa kgakgamalo jang mo bathong! Botlhe ba boela kwa ntlwaneng e e kwa godimo mme ba a ja selalelo sa Morena mmogo; Paulo a rera gape thero e telele go fitlhelela phakela fa a ba tlogela lwa bofelo!
